mapper.sql: serialNum, procurementPlanSerial, materielSerial, supplyMaterielSerial, planCount, completeCount, deliveryDate, deliveryAddress, status, sort, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from demandmateriel
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into demandmateriel (serialNum, procurementPlanSerial, materielSerial, supplyMaterielSerial, planCount, completeCount, deliveryDate, deliveryAddress, status, sort, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, remark) values (#{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procurementPlanSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{completeCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(m.materielName separator '、' ) from demandMateriel dm left join materiel m on m.serialNum=dm.materielSerial where dm.procurementPlanSerial=#{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dm.delFlg='0'
